questions.question: If you have a page of search results and want to highlight the search term, what HTML tag would you use?

What is the role of a Controller in MVC architecture?
options: It acts as an intermediary between Model and View, handling user inputs and updates.
It structures the data in a meaningful way for the application.
It defines how data should be presented to the user.
